pkgmetadata.longdescription: Client for 'Turfjs' for 'Geospatial' Analysis // Client for 'Turfjs' (http://turfjs.org) for 'geospatial' analysis. The package revolves around using 'GeoJSON' data. Functions are included for creating 'GeoJSON' data objects, measuring aspects of 'GeoJSON', and combining, transforming, and creating random 'GeoJSON' data objects.
